column1: #Text=A shake-up of the entrenched, calcified, corrupt system was in order.
#Text=A more thoughtful and constructive approach couldn't survive the political/media process.
#Text=Will he make changes in the interest of ordinary Americans?
#Text=Or, will he revert to type as a member of the economic elite, maintaining the advantages of his class?
#Text=The best hope for real change may well come from people mobilizing in the wake of the chaos that Trump will bring.
#Text=If that happens, the Trump presidency will not have been such a bad thing.
